lines.gurmukhi: pRym rs ko pRqwpu soeI jwnY jw mY bIqy mdn mdon miqvwro jg jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Praym Ras Ko Prataapu Soee Jaanai Jaa Mai Beetay , Madan Madon Mativaaro Jag Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: He alone can appreciate the greatness of Lord's love-elixir who experiences it. It is just like a drunkard who is considered crazy by the world.

lines.gurmukhi: GUrm hoie Gwiel so GUmq Arun diRg imqR sqRqw inlj ljw hU ljwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Ghooram Hoi Ghaail So Ghoomat Aroun Driga , Mitr Satrataa Nilaj Lajaa Hoo Lajaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a warrior wounded in the battlefield wanders around with his eyes blazing red, he shams the feeling of friendship and animosity,

lines.gurmukhi: rsnw rsIlI kQw AkQ kY mon bRq An rs rihq n auqr bKwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Rasanaa Raseelee Kadaa Akad Kai Mon Brata , An Ras Rahit N Outar Bakhaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One enamoured by the love of God has his speech nectar-like due to perpetual recitation of Lord's indescribable traits. He adopts silence and is free from all other desires. He talks to no one and remains relishing the sweetness of Lord's naam.

lines.gurmukhi: suriq sMkoc smsir Asquiq inMdw pg fgmg jq kq ibsmwnIAY ]173]
lines.transliteration_english: Surati Sankoch Samasari Asatouti Nindaa , Pag Dagamag Jat Kat Bisamaaneeai ?173?

Shabad OS B.translation: He keeps all his desires under wrap. Praise and insult is all alike to him. In the stupor of Naam he is seen living a life of wonders and marvels. (173)
